hero.summary: I build modern, high-performance web applications. Passionate about clean code, scalable architecture, and exceptional UX. Always looking for the next technical challenge.
about.p1: I am a technology-passionate developer from Bucharest, with 2 years of experience building enterprise web applications using Angular and .NET Core.
about.p2: I have worked in agile teams, contributing to projects with thousands of active users. I love to constantly learn — whether it's a new framework, a design pattern, or performance optimizations.
about.p3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring open-source projects, experimenting with AI/ML, or playing competitive games. I believe the best solutions come from combining creativity with technical rigor.
about.cleanCode.title: Clean Code Advocate
about.cleanCode.desc: SOLID principles, design patterns, and code that reads like a story.
about.performance.title: Performance First
about.performance.desc: I optimize down to the last millisecond. Lazy loading, caching, bundle optimization.
about.problemSolver.title: Problem Solver
about.problemSolver.desc: I love breaking down complex problems into elegant, scalable solutions.
skills.subtitle: My main stack focuses on the Angular + .NET Core ecosystem, complemented by modern DevOps and cloud tools.
exp.subtitle: 2 years of accelerated growth, from internship to full-time developer in teams delivering quality software.
exp.0.desc: Enterprise application development for clients in the financial and retail sectors.
exp.0.resp.0: Frontend module development in Angular 17 with NgRx state management
exp.0.resp.1: REST APIs and microservices implementation in .NET Core 8
exp.0.resp.2: Code reviews and mentoring for junior developers
exp.0.resp.3: Direct collaboration with Product Owner and UX team
exp.1.desc: First professional experience, focused on accelerated learning and concrete contributions.
exp.1.resp.1: API endpoint implementation in ASP.NET Core
exp.1.resp.2: Writing unit tests and integration tests
exp.2.desc: Introduction to professional software development in a startup environment.
exp.2.resp.2: Participating in code reviews as an observer
portfolio.subtitle: A selection of projects I've worked on — from enterprise applications to open source contributions.

project.0.desc: E-commerce platform with admin dashboard, product management, and order processing.

project.1.desc: Task management system with real-time updates and team collaboration.

project.2.desc: Reusable UI component library for Angular, with theming and accessibility.

project.3.desc: Template for .NET Core APIs with best practices: CQRS, MediatR, FluentValidation.
project.4.title: Real Estate Portal
project.4.desc: Real estate portal with advanced search, interactive maps, and listing system.
project.5.title: DevOps Dashboard
project.5.desc: Dashboard for CI/CD pipeline monitoring and microservice health checks.
edu.subtitle: Continuous learning through formal education, online courses, and professional certifications.
testimonials.subtitle: Feedback from people I've collaborated with on projects.
testimonials.0.quote: Andrei made a significant contribution to our team. His code is clean, well-documented, and easy to maintain. A pleasure to work with.
testimonials.1.quote: Very dedicated and eager to learn. Made impressive progress in a short time and took on responsibilities beyond expectations.
testimonials.2.quote: A developer with attention to detail and a focus on quality. Delivered complex features on time and actively contributed to code reviews.
contact.subtitle: I'm open to new opportunities, interesting projects, or simply a conversation about tech. Don't hesitate to reach out!
